mapper.select: SELECT detail.org_id,detail.prac_id,detail.prac_intro,detail.prac_addr,detail.prac_num,detail.prac_status,detail.prac_name,org.name FROM `sys_org_prac_manage` AS detail LEFT JOIN `sys_org_details` AS org ON detail.org_id = org.org_id ORDER BY detail.prac_status DESC

SELECT detail.org_id,detail.prac_id,detail.prac_intro,detail.prac_addr,detail.prac_num,detail.prac_status,detail.prac_name,org.name FROM `sys_org_prac_manage` AS detail LEFT JOIN `sys_org_details` AS org ON detail.org_id = org.org_id
and org.name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
and detail.create_time LIKE "%"#{year}"%"
and detail.prac_name like "%"#{query}"%"
ORDER BY detail.prac_status DESC
